description: Make yourself at home in this amazing NYC apartment, close to Central Park North, in the heart of Harlem. You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood, and the ambiance. You'll be living above a Starbucks, a Best Yet Supermarket, & a Chase Bank. Two blocks from subway station, great restaurants, awesome Beer Hall steps away, and only 10 minute subway ride to midtown My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Chic and Modern in the heart of Harlem
